dublinCore.dc:title: 110 HR 3324 IH: To extend the authority to collect Shasta-Trinity Marina fees through fiscal year 2029.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Huffman (for himself and Mr. LaMalfa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To extend the authority to collect Shasta-Trinity Marina fees through fiscal year 2029.

section.text: Section 422 of the Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2008 (Public Law 110â€“161; 121 Stat 2149) as amended, is further amended by striking and each subsequent fiscal year through fiscal year 2019 and inserting and each subsequent fiscal year through fiscal year 2029.
